name: Reaction Transaction
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 49 (Theme: Unstable)

It's time to mix potions and change lives.  You are an alchemist whose shop is known across the land for its skillfully crafted elixirs. A potion seller. 

Using your various ingredients, your job is to craft brews to fit the needs of your customers!  From a dashing knight seeking strength to the elderly, the customers needs will keep you on your toes.
